code: import React from'react';import{useSettings}from'../../contexts/SettingsContext';import{useTheme}from'../../contexts/ThemeContext';import'./Settings.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Settings=()=>{const{theme,setTheme}=useTheme();const{settings,setSettings}=useSettings();const handleChange=(setting,value)=>{if(setting==='theme'){setTheme(value);}else{setSettings(prev=>({...prev,[setting]:value}));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Settings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Appearance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"setting-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Theme"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:theme,onChange:e=>handleChange('theme',e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"dark",children:"Dark"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"light",children:"Light"})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Display"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"setting-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Show WPM"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:settings.showWPM,onChange:e=>handleChange('showWPM',e.target.checked)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"setting-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Show Accuracy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:settings.showAccuracy,onChange:e=>handleChange('showAccuracy',e.target.checked)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"setting-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Show Progress"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:settings.showProgress,onChange:e=>handleChange('showProgress',e.target.checked)})]})]})]});};export default Settings;
